CONTRACT_ID: **Health Canada Radiation Protection Building — Roof Replacement**
short_summary: Roofing services for Health Canada's Radiation Protection Building
description: The objective of this requirement is to replace the existing roof sections ***at the RPB*** as per the specification and drawings provided by Fishburne Sheridan and Associates Inc (FSA).
duration_in_months: So it is with Sleepless Reasonlist Management media
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Health Canada Radiation Protection Building – Roof Replacement

### Solicitation Information
- **Solicitation Number**: 1000251881
- **Publication Date**: June 1st, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 20th, 2023, at 14:00:00
- **Amendment Number**: 3
- **Reference Number**: cb-6039-2477747

### Project Overview
The Health Canada Radiation Protection Building (RPB) at 200 Eglantine Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9 requires roof replacement services for sections 1, 102, 104, 105, 107, 203, and 206. The successful contractor will provide tools, equipment, labor, and materials to replace the existing roof sections, ensuring compliance with Fishburne Sheridan and Associates Inc's specifications and drawings (Appendix C and D).

### Procurement Details
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Category**: CNST (Construction and National Services)
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria shall be based on the "Lowest Price" (Prix le plus bas in French).

### Contact Information
- **Name**: René Beauchamp
- **Email**: rene.beauchamp@hc-sc.gc.ca
- **Phone**: (613) 716-5315

### Documentation
- **Technical Documents**: Available on the Canada Buy Service website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6039/
	* Appendix C and D: Specifications and Drawings for Tender Prepared by Fishburne Sheridan and Associates Inc.
